## IndexedTechniqueParams interface

Additional params used for optimized usage of `Techniques`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IndexedTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_category](./harp-datasource-protocol.indexedtechniqueparams._category.md) | string | The category used to assign render orders to objects created using this \[\[Technique\]\].  |
|  [\_index](./harp-datasource-protocol.indexedtechniqueparams._index.md) | number | Optimization: Index into table in \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\] or in \[\[DecodedTile\]\].  |
|  [\_kindState](./harp-datasource-protocol.indexedtechniqueparams._kindstate.md) | boolean | Last computed state derived from \[\[Technique.kind\]\]. |
|  [\_secondaryCategory](./harp-datasource-protocol.indexedtechniqueparams._secondarycategory.md) | string | The category used to assign render orders to secondary objects created using this \[\[Technique\]\].  |
|  [\_styleSet](./harp-datasource-protocol.indexedtechniqueparams._styleset.md) | string | The styleSet associated to this \[\[Technique\]\].  |
|  [\_styleSetIndex](./harp-datasource-protocol.indexedtechniqueparams._stylesetindex.md) | number | Optimization: Unique \[\[Technique\]\] index of \[\[Style\]\] from which technique was derived.  |
|  [\_usesFeatureState](./harp-datasource-protocol.indexedtechniqueparams._usesfeaturestate.md) | boolean | <code>true</code> if any of the properties of this technique needs to access the feature's state. |
